title: how long do support ticket responses take? I could use some help
body:
I haven't been able to play league for a couple days now (I only sent the ticket about 26ish hours ago though) because of a nasty bug that's been forcing me to dc every 30 seconds or so after I connect/reconnect.

I was just wondering how long I should expect to wait to get some help to be able to play league again, because I actually had just gotten the motivation to climb in rank right before this stuff started happening to me unfortunately

ticket #23456025

replies.body:
Turnaround times on ticket submissions changes quite a bit, depending on what types of issues are trending during the time you create a ticket. Due to events lately, we're pretty swamped with tickets, so responses are a bit more delayed than normal. 

A tech specialist will pick your ticket up as soon as possible, we're not going to leave you in the dirt. Let me know if you have any questions.
